Changelog

Source: NEWS.md

easystats 0.4.0

  • Includes a new package for automated reporting of statistical analyses: report.

  • Moves rvest, xml2, and remotes from Imports to Suggests.

easystats 0.3.0

  • Revised startup-messages, so these can be suppressed by using suppressPackageStartupMessages().

  • The CRAN-check for errors or warnings in easystats-packages is no longer shown by default on startup. Use easystats::CRAN_checks() to see them.

Contents

Developed by Daniel Lüdecke, Dominique Makowski.
